verses.verse: וַיִּמְעֲל֧וּ <S%H4603><s%> vai-yim-'a-Lu committed בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- But the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מַ֖עַל <S%H4604><s%> Ma-'al a trespass בַּחֵ֑רֶם <S%H2764><s%> ba-Che-rem; in the accursed thing וַיִּקַּ֡ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took עָכָ֣ן <S%H5912><s%> 'a-Chan for Achan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son כַּרְמִי֩ <S%H3756><s%> kar-Mi of Carmi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son זַבְדִּ֨י <S%H2067><s%> zav-Di of Zabdi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son זֶ֜רַח <S%H2226><s%> Ze-rach of Zerah לְמַטֵּ֤ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh of the tribe יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- some הַחֵ֔רֶם <S%H2764><s%> ha-Che-rem, of the accursed thing וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> vai-yi-char- was kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> 'af and the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בִּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> biv-Nei against the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent יְהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim men מִֽירִיח֗וֹ <S%H3405><s%> mi-ri-Cho, from Jericho הָעַ֞י <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai to Ai אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- which [is] beside בֵּ֥ית beit אָ֙וֶן֙ <S%H1007><s%> 'a-ven Bethaven מִקֶּ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem on the east side לְבֵֽית־ le-veit- אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El, of Bethel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and spake אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and to לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto them saying עֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu Go up וְרַגְּל֣וּ <S%H7270><s%> ve-rag-ge-Lu and view אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the country וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu went up הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, the men וַֽיְרַגְּל֖וּ <S%H7270><s%> vay-rag-ge-Lu and viewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai. Ai

וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu And they returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a', to Joshua וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said אֵלָיו֮ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יַ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> Ya-'al go up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָם֒ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am unto him Let not all the people כְּאַלְפַּ֣יִם <S%H505><s%> ke-'al-Pa-yim thousand אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, men א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or כִּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> kish-Lo-shet but let about two or three אֲלָפִ֣ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, men יַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu go up וְיַכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> ve-yak-Ku and smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֑י <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai; Ai אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תְּיַגַּע־ <S%H3021><s%> te-yag-ga'- to labour שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, [and] make not all the people כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> me-'At thither for they [are but] few הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. like

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu So there went up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am thither of the people שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah, there כִּשְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> kish-Lo-shet about three אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; men וַיָּנֻ֕סוּ <S%H5127><s%> vai-ya-Nu-su and they fled לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men הָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai. of Ai

וַיַּכּ֨וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku smote מֵהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem like אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> 'an-Shei And the men הָעַ֗י <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai, of Ai כִּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> kish-lo-Shim of them about thirty וְשִׁשָּׁה֙ <S%H8337><s%> ve-shish-Shah and six אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, men וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֞וּם <S%H7291><s%> vai-yir-de-Fum for they chased לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei them [from] before הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar the gate עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far הַשְּׁבָרִ֔ים <S%H7671><s%> hash-she-va-Rim, [even] unto Shebarim וַיַּכּ֖וּם <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Kum and smote בַּמּוֹרָ֑ד <S%H4174><s%> bam-mo-Rad; them in the going down וַיִּמַּ֥ס <S%H4549><s%> vai-yim-Mas melted לְבַב־ <S%H3824><s%> le-vav- wherefore the hearts הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi and became לְמָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> le-Ma-yim. and became as water

וַיִּקְרַ֨ע <S%H7167><s%> vai-yik-Ra' rent יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua שִׂמְלֹתָ֗יו <S%H8071><s%> sim-lo-Tav, his clothes וַיִּפֹּל֩ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol and fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פָּנָ֨יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav upon his face אַ֜רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah to the earth לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ha-'E-rev, until the eventide ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> ve-zik-Nei he and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu and put עָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> 'a-Far dust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sham. upon their heads

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua אֲהָ֣הּ׀ <S%H162><s%> 'a-Hah Alas O אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD לָ֠מָה <S%H4100><s%> La-mah why הֵעֲבַ֨רְתָּ <S%H5674><s%> he-'a-Var-ta wherefore hast thou at all הַעֲבִ֜יר <S%H5674><s%> ha-'a-Vir over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, Jordan לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to deliver אֹתָ֛נוּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ta-nu בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad us into the hand הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites לְהַאֲבִידֵ֑נוּ <S%H6><s%> le-ha-'a-vi-De-nu; to destroy וְלוּ֙ <S%H3863><s%> ve-Lu us;would to God הוֹאַ֣לְנוּ <S%H2974><s%> ho-'Al-nu we had been content וַנֵּ֔שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> van-Ne-shev, and dwelt בְּעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den. Jordan

בִּ֖י <S%H994><s%> bi O אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai; Lord מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> mah what אֹמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mar, what shall I say אַ֠חֲרֵי <S%H310><s%> 'A-cha-rei when אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after הָפַ֧ךְ <S%H2015><s%> ha-Fach turneth יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel עֹ֖רֶף <S%H6203><s%> 'O-ref their backs לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vav. their enemies

וְיִשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> ve-yish-me-'U shall hear הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, For the Canaanites וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei and all the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the land וְנָסַ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> ve-na-Sab-bu [of it] and shall environ us round עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu, and וְהִכְרִ֥יתוּ <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-Ri-tu and cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמֵ֖נוּ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-nu our name מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; from the earth וּמַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- and what תַּעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh and what wilt thou do לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> le-shim-Cha our name הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol. unto thy great ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua קֻ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> kum Get thee up לָ֑ךְ Lach; לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why זֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, he אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you נֹפֵ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> no-Fel wherefore liest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha. accept

חָטָא֙ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta hath sinned יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam have also עָבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-ve-Ru and they have also transgressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֔י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti, my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוִּ֖יתִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti which I commanded אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam; וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam have even לָֽקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> la-ke-Chu them for they have even taken מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- some הַחֵ֔רֶם <S%H2764><s%> ha-Che-rem, of the accursed thing וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam both גָּֽנְבוּ֙ <S%H1589><s%> ga-ne-Vu and have also stolen וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam have also כִּֽחֲשׁ֔וּ <S%H3584><s%> ki-cha-Shu, and dissembled וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam have even שָׂ֥מוּ <S%H7760><s%> Sa-mu also and they have put בִכְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3627><s%> vich-lei-Hem. [it] even among their own stuff
